title: Cant create PBE account
body:
I was sent the email telling me that i was accepted into the PBE, but when i click on the "create your PBE account" option in the email i am taken to a tab that loads for a minute or so then says "error: 500".
I've wanted a PBE account for a while, so it makes me sad that i cant get it to work when i am given the opportunity {{champion:32}} {{item:3073}}

replies.body: I've seen some reports on this, and it may be caused by some connection problem.  See if you can workaround this by using another device, Incognito mode, or even using [VPN](https://www.hotspotshield.com/).  Hope that helps!

I appreciate the help. I was able to download the client and create an account. Obviously i have not been able to do anything on the account because the server has been down, but every  time i close the client i have to completely redownload it again. is there an easier way to do this? it is pretty tedious to wait through the entire reinstallation of the client every time i want to play.
My Friend has the same problem but another device did not work, is there another way to fix this? Maybe resending to email.
